datasets.name: 32897adc
datasets.query:
SELECT distinct chr_id,disease_trait,link FROM db_omics_solacc.dbgap_db.gwas_catalog_full
WHERE chr_id in  ('22','21','20','19')

datasets.name: 454db18a
datasets.query:
select sqc.sampleId, si.population,si.population_description,si.gender,sqc.*
from db_omics_solacc.variant_db.glow_chr22_sample_qc sqc
join db_omics_solacc.phenotype_db.sample_information si
on sqc.sampleId = si.sample
where sqc.rHetHomVar > :min_rHetHom and sqc.rHetHomVar < :max_rHetHom

datasets.name: 46e69c91
datasets.query:
select sample,family_id,population, population_description, gender, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY family_id) AS n_per_family
from db_omics_solacc.phenotype_db.sample_information 
order by 6 desc

SELECT chr_id,snps,strongest_snp_risk_allele, disease_trait,link,study,chr_pos,mapped_gene,snp_gene_ids, risk_allele_frequency  FROM db_omics_solacc.dbgap_db.gwas_catalog_full
WHERE chr_id in  ('22','21','20','19')

datasets.name: 6d37e628
datasets.query:
select distinct population,population_description
from db_omics_solacc.phenotype_db.sample_information
order by population

datasets.name: c6c07c87
datasets.query:
with var_statst as (
    SELECT contigName, start as pos, floor(start/1e6,2) as pos_Mb, referenceAllele, nHet, nHom, attributes.ALL_AF
    FROM db_omics_solacc.variant_db.glow_chr22_variant_stats
)
select contigName, pos, pos_Mb, ALL_AF as AF,
avg(nHet) OVER (PARTITION BY pos_Mb) as avg_nHet,
avg(nHom) OVER (PARTITION BY pos_Mb) as avg_nHom
from var_statst
where pos_Mb > :start_pos and pos_Mb < :end_pos

datasets.name: fba223c8
datasets.query:
select distinct varId, genotype, population, sum(1) over (partition by genotype, population)/sum(1) over (partition by population) as genotype_frequency from hls_lifesciences.variant_db.chr22_sample_vars_pop
where varId = :var_id

widget.name: 237b1d03
widget.textbox_spec:
#  Look up samples with a given risk factor
Search for reported SNPs for a given disease/trait from GWAS Catalog and based on the results look up for samples with high-risk alelle

frame.title: List of disease/traits with reported association
Number of Families in the Dataset
Average ratio of Het/Hom by population

widget.name: 79a1fb23
widget.textbox_spec:
# 1000 Genomes Data Explorer

This dashboard allows users to explore samples within the 1000 Genomes dataset for various purposes:

- Exploring samples for a specific population.
- Accessing sample-level summary statistics, such as Het/Home ratio and nDeletions, across different populations.
- Generating cohorts based on identified risk alleles from GWAS catalog data.

frame.description: look up a variant of interest

frame.title: Associated SNPs for a given trait
frame.description: look up a disease or trait of interest on a given chromosome
